verses.roman:
mayā niṣpāditaṁ hy atra
deva-kāryam aśeṣataḥ
yad-artham avatīrṇo 'ham
aṁśena brahmaṇārthitaḥ

synonyms: mayā—by Me; niṣpāditam—accomplished; hi—certainly; atra—within this world; deva-kāryam—work for the benefit of the demigods; aśeṣataḥ—completely, with nothing remaining; yat—for whose; artham—sake; avatīrṇaḥ—incarnated; aham—I; aṁśena—with My plenary portion, Baladeva; brahmaṇā—by Lord Brahmā; arthitaḥ—being prayed for.
translation: Answering the prayer of Lord Brahmā, I descended within this world along with My plenary portion, Lord Baladeva, and performed various activities on behalf of the demigods. I have now completed My mission here.
